text:
@realDonaldTrump Yes, we will. On November 3rd. We'll volunteer to disinfect our @WhiteHouse of the germs you leave behind. BTW,  good luck locking yourself in your bedroom trying to hide from #coronavirus.
Maybe you should invite @IvankaTrump to stay with you. https://t.co/wFODfmwRMx
